metadata.name: All Monster Comics
metadata.description: Alternative Comics Presents All Monster Comics! - free for Hallowe'en 2014. Written and pencilled by David Lasky with inking by Roland Pete Friedrich, Gabrielle Gamboa, K. Thor Jensen, Karl Stevens, Dalton Webb, Scott Stripling, Patrick Lugo, Reid Psaltis, David Lasky and Andrei Molotiu. An 8-page mini comic free for you.
